title: Production of commercial gramophonic discs
creator_credit: P.J. Brook and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: A look at the various processes involved in the making of a record - from the artists recording onto multi-track tapes, through to the marketing and distribution to the public. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: P.J. Brook and South Australian Film Corporation
